channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The State-Led Crackdown on Grok and xAI Has Begun
item.description: At least 37 attorneys general for US states and territories are taking action against xAI after Grok generated a flood of nonconsensual sexual images ...

item.title: The 50 Best Shows on HBO Max, WIRED’s Picks (February 2026)
item.description: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms, The Pitt, and Industry are just a few of the shows you need to be watching on HBO Max this month.

item.title: New Data Shows Robotaxis Competing on Price—and Speed
item.description: Research from the ride-hail aggregator Obi finds Waymo is starting to edge up on Uber and Lyft in San Francisco. Tesla, which operates a ride-hail ser...

item.title: Amazon agrees to pay consumers $309M in returns policy settlement
item.description: The lawsuit, filed in 2023, alleged that Amazon caused "substantial unjustified monetary losses” for consumers who returned an item but were still cha...

item.title: TikTok joins Snap to settle social media addiction lawsuit
item.description: Jury selection begins Tuesday as this case moves closer to trial.

item.title: These Feature-Packed Earbuds Are Less Than $50
item.description: Anker knocks almost half the cost off its already budget-friendly earbuds.

item.title: Bluesky teases 2026 roadmap: a better Discover feed, real-time features and more
item.description: Bluesky is teasing new features and improvements ranging from the Discover feed to video support.

item.title: Amazon Alexa+ Is Now Available to Everyone. Here’s How to Turn It Off (2026)
item.description: Alexa+ has been rolling out to everyone with a Prime membership, even if you didn’t ask for it. Here’s how to change it back.

item.title: Anthropic reportedly upped its latest raise to $20B
item.description: Anthropic looks to raise $20 billion at more than $300 billion valuation, according to reports.

item.title: Anthropic and OpenAI CEOs condemn ICE violence, praise Trump
